## Chess.turn() method

Returns the current side to move.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
turn(): Color;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Color](./chess.ts.color.md)

## Example


```js
chess.load('rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/4P3/8/PPPP1PPP/RNBQKBNR b KQkq e3 0 1')
chess.turn()
// -> 'b'

```
